item.title: 新兴市场资产在增长和利率风险中跌至 2024 年低点
item.description: 新兴市场股票基准指数抹去了 2024 年的升幅，货币指数则创下年内新低，因为有迹象表明全球货币宽松政策将推迟，中国经济复苏依然疲弱。【原文：The benchmark index for emerging-market equities erased its 2024 advance and the gauge for currencies posted a new low for the year amid signals global monetary easing will be delayed and China’s economic recovery remains weak.】

item.title: 德意志银行和摩根士丹利认为欧洲央行今年仅有三次降息
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）都下调了对欧洲央行借贷成本的预测，预计今年只会有三次变动。【原文：Deutsche Bank and Morgan Stanley both trimmed their forecasts for European Central Bank borrowing costs, predicting now only three moves this year.】

item.title: 印度信实公司试图出售美国石油，因为俄罗斯石油流量正在回升
item.description: 信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）上周向亚洲其他买家提供了美国石油，这令市场感到意外，因为炼油商在购买原油后几周内就试图转售原油的做法并不常见。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. offered US oil to other buyers in Asia last week, surprising the market as it’s unusual for refiners to try and resell crude within weeks of buying it.】

item.title: 交易低迷，汇丰裁减十余名亚洲投资银行家
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，在整个亚洲地区交易低迷的情况下，汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）已开始对其亚洲投资银行进行新一轮裁员。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has started a new round of job cuts at its Asia investment bank amid a slump in dealmaking across the region, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国开发商将香港豪华公寓项目价格下调 40
item.description: 在债务偿还压力不断增大、香港房地产市场竞争日益加剧的情况下，陷入困境的中国开发商开始降价近一半，试图出售香港一个新综合体的豪华公寓。【原文：Distressed Chinese developers trying to sell luxury apartments at a new complex in Hong Kong have begun slashing prices by almost half amid mounting debt repayment pressure and intensifying competition in the city’s property market.】

item.title: 支付量增长放缓，慧科收入不及预期
item.description: Wise Plc 公布的第四季度营收不及分析师预期，原因是转账应用的使用量增长放缓。【原文：Wise Plc reported revenue in its fourth quarter that missed analyst estimates as growth in the usage of the money-transfer app slowed.】

item.title: 苏格兰电力公司将为多收客户费用支付 150 万英镑
item.description: 英国最大的能源供应商之一因违反客户账单价格上限而被处以 150 万英镑（约合 190 万美元）的罚款。【原文：One of Britain’s largest energy suppliers was slapped with a £1.5 million ($1.9 million) penalty after breaching a price cap on customer bills.】

item.title: 欧洲央行雷恩称地缘政治是降息的最大风险所在
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，通胀放缓为欧洲央行在今年夏天开始降息打开了大门，但地缘政治仍有可能破坏降息计划。【原文：Slower inflation has opened the door for the European Central Bank to start lowering interest rates this summer, though geopolitics could still derail such plans, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 在裁员之际，Stellantis 公司首席执行官 3900 万美元的薪酬引起了投资者的不满
item.description: Stellantis NV 首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）提出的 2023 年薪酬跳涨计划遭到了反对，因为这家吉普车制造商正在进行大幅裁员，并在电动车转型过程中实现艰难的节约目标。【原文：Stellantis NV Chief Executive Officer Carlos Tavares’ jump in 2023 remuneration is getting pushback as the Jeep maker pursues deep job cuts and tough savings goals in the EV transition.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡力争在未来几周内与债券持有人达成协议
item.description: 在第一轮直接会谈未能达成协议后，斯里兰卡正寻求在未来几周内与违约美元债券持有者达成债务重组协议。【原文：Sri Lanka is seeking to reach a deal to restructure debt with holders of its defaulted dollar bonds in the next few weeks, after a first round of direct talks failed to yield an agreement.】

item.title: 以色列誓言反击伊朗袭击，欧洲天然气跳涨
item.description: 以色列军方高官重申，以色列别无选择，只能对伊朗周末发动的无人机和导弹袭击作出回应，此后欧洲天然气价格周二继续上涨。【原文：European natural gas prices kept rising on Tuesday after top Israeli military officials reasserted that their country has no choice but to respond to Iran’s weekend drone and missile attack.】

item.description: 丹麦的老证券交易所是一座有 400 年历史的受保护建筑，位于丹麦议会旁边，周二发生火灾，导致警方关闭了内城的部分地区。【原文：Denmark’s old stock exchange, a protected 400-year-old building located next to the country’s parliament, caught fire on Tuesday, leading to police shut down parts of the inner city.】

item.title: 官员称中国青年失业率上升亟待关注
item.description: 一位政府官员警告说，中国不断上升的青年失业率需要更严格的审查，因为疲软的劳动力市场继续拖累世界第二大经济体的增长。【原文：China’s rising youth unemployment rate needs more scrutiny, a government official warned, as a weak labor market continues to weigh on growth in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 英国石油公司（BP）专注于熟悉的领域，其竞争对手则在开拓新的石油勘探领域
item.description: 从伊朗到阿拉斯加，英国石油公司（BP Plc）因发现前沿石油而声名鹊起，但在当今最热门的新石油勘探领域，该公司却明显缺席。该公司的勘探和生产主管对此却很满意。【原文：For a company that made its name with frontier oil discoveries from Iran to Alaska, BP Plc is notably absent from today’s hottest new oil plays. item.title: 花旗银行预计黄金将触及 3,000 美元，投资者流入为涨势注入活力
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.）表示，在美联储最终将降息的预期下，投资者资金流入不断增加，黄金将在未来6至18个月内达到每盎司3000美元的价位。【原文：Gold is set to reach $3,000 an ounce over the next six to 18 months on increasing investor inflows amid expectations that the Federal Reserve will eventually cut interest rates, Citigroup Inc. said, adding to a roll call of Wall Street banks that have raised forecasts.】

item.title: 由于估值问题，对 Samsonite 的收购兴趣正在减弱
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，私募股权公司在评估 Samsonite International SA 的收购价格过高后，正在放弃对该公司的收购，从而为这家箱包生产商的两地上市扫清了道路。【原文：Private equity firms are backing away from Samsonite International SA after assessing that it is priced too highly for a buyout, according to people familiar with the situation, clearing the way for a dual listing of the luggage maker.】

item.title: 春节后中国航空旅行人数再创新高
item.description: 在政府努力促进国家旅游业发展和国内度假需求强劲的背景下，中国各航空公司第一季度的飞行人数创下了历史新高。【原文：China’s airlines flew a record number of people in the first quarter, amid government efforts to boost the nation’s tourism sector and strong demand for holidays at home.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为美联储推迟减息将推后亚洲的宽松政策
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的经济学家认为，随着美联储推迟放宽政策，亚洲大多数央行都可能在今年晚些时候开始降息。【原文：Most central banks across Asia are likely to begin cutting interest rates later in the year — if at all, according to economists at Morgan Stanley, as the Federal Reserve delays its own policy easing.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机袭击俄罗斯对原油出口的影响
item.description: 乌克兰最近对俄罗斯炼油厂发动的一系列无人机袭击在分析师和交易商中引发了一个问题：这是否会导致莫斯科将炼油厂无法加工的大量原油转移到全球市场？【原文：Ukraine’s recent spate of drone attacks on oil refineries in Russia have led to a question among analysts and traders: will it result in Moscow diverting large amounts of crude — that the plants are unable to process — into the global market place?】

item.title: Spinneys 超市股东将在迪拜首次公开募股中出售 25% 的股份
item.description: 高端连锁超市 Spinneys 1961 Holding plc 背后的家族计划在迪拜证券交易所首次公开募股，出售公司 25% 的股份。【原文：The family behind high-end supermarket chain Spinneys 1961 Holding plc plans to sell a 25% stake in the company on the Dubai stock exchange in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 中国在塑料行业日益增长的主导地位正在挤垮亚洲竞争对手

item.title: 即使干预风险上升，日元交易员仍为 160 日元水平做好准备
item.description: 日元暴跌正促使交易员们盘算，即使干预的阴影迫在眉睫，陷入困境的日本货币还能跌多少。【原文：A tumbling yen is spurring traders to game plan how much further Japan’s beleaguered currency can fall even with the specter of intervention looming.】
